question: when did the first ninja turtles come out
api_result: The first Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles comic book was published in May 1984. This comic, created by Kevin Eastman and Peter Laird, introduced the characters that would become iconic in popular culture. The success of the comic led to a media franchise including animated TV series, movies, toys, and other merchandise. The first animated TV series debuted in 1987, further boosting the popularity of the Ninja Turtles.
